creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: two men in elegant robes standing by a heavily dressed and ornamented horse; a man at R offers a pillow holding a crown to one of the elegantly dressed men, who holds his hand over the crown; man at lower center bows before the man taking the crown; while other men holding swords and spears watch on
marks: Signature and Date bottom margin, in print, illegible signature; 1777
title: King of Bohemia
